title: Ticket #4626: MODIFY_REQUEST_EXPR_* are not boolean
description: The manual claims that the settings MODIFY_REQUEST_EXPR_REQUESTMEMORY, MODIFY_REQUEST_EXPR_REQUESTDISK, and MODIFY_REQUEST_EXPR_REQUESTCPUS are boolean expressions. They are not. They are integer expressions, identical to RequestMemory, RequestDisk, and RequestCPUs attributes in a job ad. When creating a dynamic slot, the the MODIFY_REQUEST_EXPR_* settings will be evaluated as integers and the result used to allocate resources for the dynamic slot. Typically, they will refer to the Request* attributes in the job ad.
